title: etherealMatt
author: etherealMatt
content: Supercharge Your Trading with Our Cutting-Edge Trading/MEV Bot! üíºüí∞Take your trading game to the next level with our powerful and user-friendly trading/MEV bot. Get our trading/MEV bot today and watch your trading endeavors reach new heights! üí™üí•Contact Direct for source files and setup guide.WhatsApp: +15512770297

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: For anyone interested in the offer, I recommend asking yourself why the author of an automatic bot that brings repeatable returns would like to sell his program while sharing the cake (potential profit from ¬†his portfolio). The second question such a person should ask himself is "if it's a good business for the seller, then why are such bots not sold by market leaders, but only shady people from the forum and why via a whatsap account and not a professional website ...After answering these questions, the potential buyer should probably already know what to do with this offer  if not, I'll give you a hint - stay away.No one is selling working trading bot via whatsapp.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: I know some will still fall for this kind of offer as long as they keep hearing something new to help facilitate thier trading experience, but what I will like to advise here is that anything not worked don't last, trading bot cannot just be used in a single direction to favour one wide than the other, remember those bots also have their limits, i also believe that there are many trading indications that could be use to arrived same result needed.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: etherealMatt on June 11, 2023, 12:48:28 PMTake your trading game to the next level with our powerful and user-friendly trading/MEV bot. No more manual guesswork ‚Äì our bot automates your trades, leveraging smart algorithms to maximize your profit potential.Very nice presentation of that useless bot, but sorry we are not interested in such bots and we keep huge distance from any stuff that does trading automatically for us. You should try to find another market to sell out your program because no one in this forum trust such bots and those applications aren't reliable at all. If your bot is truly that good then why aren't you using it yourself to earn huge profits from it yourself? The reason is simple because you are sure that it doesn't work the way you represented it.I recommend all the forum members to stay away from such bots because the OP might have added malicious code into it to steal your Bitcoin. I have seen many such cases where people sold malware by presenting it as a bot or a automatic earning solution, and all those people who installed such applications due to lack of technical knowledge were hacked by such malicious actors. It's always a good choice to ignore such applications and learn the concepts of trading and do it yourself rather than relying on those bots.

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on June 12, 2023, 10:14:24 AMFor anyone interested in the offer, I recommend asking yourself why the author of an automatic bot that brings repeatable returns would like to sell his program while sharing the cake (potential profit from ¬†his portfolio). The second question such a person should ask himself is "if it's a good business for the seller, then why are such bots not sold by market leaders, but only shady people from the forum and why via a whatsap account and not a professional website ...After answering these questions, the potential buyer should probably already know what to do with this offer  if not, I'll give you a hint - stay away.No one is selling working trading bot via whatsapp. Exactly my thoughts, why's the no link to a website, only a greedy person would fall for this and¬† it doesn't move me because after all, you put your self in it.Please, If you intend to give this a try amidst the warning, do well to let us know the outcome (even though we already know what it would be)

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on June 12, 2023, 08:36:10 PMQuote from: Tytanowy Janusz on June 12, 2023, 10:14:24 AMFor anyone interested in the offer, I recommend asking yourself why the author of an automatic bot that brings repeatable returns would like to sell his program while sharing the cake (potential profit from ¬†his portfolio). The second question such a person should ask himself is "if it's a good business for the seller, then why are such bots not sold by market leaders, but only shady people from the forum and why via a whatsap account and not a professional website ...After answering these questions, the potential buyer should probably already know what to do with this offer  if not, I'll give you a hint - stay away.No one is selling working trading bot via whatsapp. Exactly my thoughts, why's the no link to a website, only a greedy person would fall for this and¬† it doesn't move me because after all, you put your self in it.Please, If you intend to give this a try amidst the warning, do well to let us know the outcome (even though we already know what it would be)While all what you say is true there is a reason why those offers keep appearing on this forum and everywhere else on the internet as well, and this is because there are enough naive people out there which are willing to give those bots a try.They actually believe there is going to be someone out there willing to share a strategy and a piece of software worth tens of millions of dollars for peanuts, and as long as this is the case then those scammers will keep posting offers like this one, as their effort is rewarded with enough money for them to keep doing this.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: etherealMatt on June 11, 2023, 12:48:28 PMSupercharge Your Trading with Our Cutting-Edge Trading/MEV Bot! üíºüí∞This might be a trading discussion board but, am not sure this is the proper place to advertise your bot as, that's what the whole content of the post suggests. It's not like your just out here talking about it but actually, advertising you or your company's bot with the repeated use of the word 'our' in your write up.Again from your construction, you don't seem to be just any newbie user. Perhaps the account is focused on the product your putting out but, you can't project more seriousness on an account that means less to you. Perhaps getting a copper membership would show your seriousness in this launch.Also, you need to show the forum some proof if you hope to get any followers. I mean like, some evidence to how your bot works like posting a deduction before its manifested in the market and after its manifested.Still, I don't think a bot equals human reasoning.

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on June 12, 2023, 10:14:24 AMFor anyone interested in the offer, I recommend asking yourself why the author of an automatic bot that brings repeatable returns would like to sell his program while sharing the cake (potential profit from ¬†his portfolio). The second question such a person should ask himself is "if it's a good business for the seller, then why are such bots not sold by market leaders, but only shady people from the forum and why via a whatsap account and not a professional website ...No free lunch and trading is correlated with trading volume. When you enter or exit a market with a coin on the market, trading volume of that coin is important. If it is very big, it is fine but if it is not too big or small trading volume, your capital will have effect on its price. So if you share your signal to others, your chance to get profit will be affected and maybe profit will change to loss.QuoteAfter answering these questions, the potential buyer should probably already know what to do with this offer  if not, I'll give you a hint - stay away.I agree.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Since the thread is related to trading using Bots or AI, I would like to take the opportunity to ask traders if it's possible to make a profit from Bot trading. Trading with bots is available on a few platforms, But I never dare to use them because I don't want to lose my money by relying on a bot I have never used. I am curious if Bot trading really works. Suppose it works; does it always make a profit? Is it a riskless method to trade? I don't think there is any way to trade without risk. When people talk about algorithms for trading, I feel like those are scams. If it is integrated into the platform, like Bot, it may have a good use case. But I don't trust any third-party programs.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: I am not surprised by the development of a lot of software that uses artificial intelligence to enhance the user experience, but I want to know more data about how the artificial intelligence algorithm works and how it works to develop the end result? Do you have diagrams showing that?There are many open source bots whose results are improved by artificial intelligence, so whoever wants there are free and verifiable alternatives or even read the code.

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: I am not sure if bots really make you some money. If you start reading about the real trading and the techniques behind them then its really sophisticated thing. I highly doubt these bots can make any much difference with their stop and enter features which are just repetition based on the profits or losses that you make. Plus giving away your account control and the funds in the hands of bots is risky too. I know we can set the limits of exhaustion but that is also poorly managed and not charming feature. Dont know I am against the bot concept since the beginning I came to know about them. The Gunbot was there on the forum, however it also went down the market line over the time. So not sure about this one.

comments.author: mvdheuvel1983
comments.body: This looks enticing but sorry no. Sadly some users on this forum would ignore the red flags in the comment section pink pointed out and would fall for this and lose a lot of money. When they lose a lot of money they won't have the guts to return and say it's because the trading bots they bought on the forum wasn't working. They'll just hide their heads in shame. Newbies should even think about using trading bots. It is not the best way to learn and grow in your trading journey. But if you think you want to go ahead with this one look on the internet for honest and real reviews.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Doan9269 on June 12, 2023, 04:07:32 PMI know some will still fall for this kind of offer as long as they keep hearing something new to help facilitate thier trading experience, but what I will like to advise here is that anything not worked don't last, trading bot cannot just be used in a single direction to favour one wide than the other, remember those bots also have their limits, i also believe that there are many trading indications that could be used to arrived same result needed. The bot doesn't have a guaranteed result mechanism and at that can not be relied on,¬† it has been proven time without numbers how this bot has failed in several ways and this is not something any trader should rely on,¬† but against all odds,¬† some lazy traders may still fall for this old and expired tricks since it promises them a stable return on the constant base which is really noticeable.

comments.author: nniicckk
comments.body: Hi Dears. I have found this one. Have somebody tried?¬† http://38.242.215.61/index.html. Tomorrow account should be activated I will update about result.

comments.author: South Park
comments.body: Quote from: greengrassis on June 23, 2023, 08:04:59 PMAnd where is the guarantee that it will do everything right? I think the answer is obvious - there are no guarantees. Everything requires experience and knowledge, you can‚Äôt earn much on bots.And in the case it was possible to earn a lot of money with bots, who in their right mind will sell a money printing piece of software like that? Most likely there are trading companies with their AI which can trade the markets on its own and make them profits, but as you may guess exactly how it works is kept secret, and probably even the existence of the software is also kept in secret, as a way to prevent anyone to get any ideas and which may decide to try to steal such an AI from them.

comments.author: Vivageneviv
comments.body: Lol why sell a bot if it is effective? Bots can be effective but I'm not sure I can trust you enough with your decision of selling. If I need AI trading, I use AI grid trading on CEXs, Bitget for example has a reliable one and I'm sure they aren't selling any time soon, lol
